name: Ext_R5_CommunicationRequest_recipient
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.CommunicationRequest.recipient for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents CommunicationRequest.recipient from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/CommunicationRequest|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Who to share the information with
element.definition: The entity (e.g. person, organization, clinical information system, device, group, or care team) which is the intended target of the communication.
element.comment: `CommunicationRequest.recipient` maps to R4B `CommunicationRequest.recipient`. Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Endpoint)` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
